projects.headline: Organic farmers own the internet.
projects.preview: Organic farmers own the internet by helping bros.
projects.description: When Organic Valley asked us to help them launch their new organic, milk-based protein shake, we realized this was our chance to rekindle a bromance, save a cultural meme, and put our beloved bromosapiens on a path towards recovery.

projects.headline: Helping bros brononymously.
projects.description: The Brononymous hotline is a real twitter app that allows concerned friends and family members to reach out to a bro anonymously, to warn him about his protein with one of 7 custom bro-tailored messages and a coupon to try Organic Fuel.

projects.headline: Cold-Pressed Juice for the People
projects.preview: Cold-pressed juiced fruits and vegetables for the people
projects.description: A new line of organic, cold-pressed juiced fruits and vegetables available at your regular old grocery store and yes, even Walmart. With Telula we’re on a mission to bring cold-pressed juice to the people.

projects.headline: Seize the cray
projects.preview: Helping professional women seize the cray.
projects.description: We commissioned a study of 1000 professional women and asked them to tell us what their mornings were really like. Then we made a video that revealed our favorite real-morning stats to let women everywhere know that if their mornings seem a little cray, they are not alone.

projects.headline: Zombie children
projects.description: A beautifully illustrated, playfully twisted survival and etiquette guide for zombie children. Humanaut produced, designed and published the book with the help of the Kickstarter community. Enjoy.

projects.headline: Futuristic Packaging
projects.preview: Packaging for a new generation of active bad asses
projects.description: We helped name, brand and design the futuristic packaging for a new generation of active bad asses who refuse to compromise on performance and their health.

projects.headline: Felt App
projects.tags: Identity, UX Design, Video, and Website
projects.preview: Sealed, stamped and mailed all from your iPhone
projects.description: An iOS app that revives the handwritten note, letting you create and send a handwritten card on fine paper--signed, sealed and delivered. All from your iPad or iPhone.

projects.headline: Sexy Super Bowl Ad
projects.preview: A sexy Super Bowl sized plot to change the world.
projects.description: Before the Super Bowl even started we were flagged for inappropriate conduct. A little competitive smack talk dished out by a sexy Scarlett Johansson was enough to get our spot ejected from the game.

projects.headline: Half & Half Bar
projects.preview: The world’s first Organic Half & Half bar.
projects.description: The world’s first organic Half & Half bar that only sells Organic Valley Half & Half in three sizes. It’s the world’s best coffee, just add coffee.
